zoomify.gui.title: Zoomify
zoomify.gui.initialZoom.name: Initial Zoom
zoomify.gui.initialZoom.description: The zoom level when you first press the keybind.
zoomify.gui.zoomInTime.name: Zoom In Time
zoomify.gui.zoomInTime.description: How many seconds to complete zooming in.
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTime.name: Zoom Out Time
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTime.description: How many seconds to complete zooming out.
zoomify.gui.zoomInTransition.name: Zoom In Transition
zoomify.gui.zoomInTransition.description: The transition type used when zooming in.
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTransition.name: Zoom Out Transition
zoomify.gui.zoomOutTransition.descriptio: The transition type used when zooming out.
zoomify.gui.affectHandFov.name: Affect Hand FOV
zoomify.gui.affectHandFov.description: When zooming, keep the FOV of the hand normal while the world view zooms in.
zoomify.gui.retainZoomSteps.name: Remember Zoom Steps
zoomify.gui.retainZoomSteps.description: Keep scroll zoom amount between zooming in and out.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoom.name: Enable Scroll Zoom
zoomify.gui.scrollZoom.description: Allow you to zoom in and out more with scroll wheel.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomAmount.name: Scroll Zoom Amount
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomAmount.description: The additional divisor of the FOV per scroll step.
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomSmoothness.name: Scroll Zoom Smoothness
zoomify.gui.scrollZoomSmoothness.descrip: How smooth/how long it takes to scroll-zoom.
zoomify.gui.smoothScrollZoom.name: Smooth Transition
zoomify.gui.smoothScrollZoom.description: Makes scrolling in and out smooth.
zoomify.gui.linearLikeSteps.name: Linear-like Steps
zoomify.gui.linearLikeSteps.description: Applies a curve to the increments to make them feel more linear.
zoomify.gui.zoomKeyBehaviour.name: Zoom Key Behaviour
zoomify.gui.zoomKeyBehaviour.description: The behaviour of the zoom key.
zoomify.gui.keybindScrolling.name: Keybind Scrolling
zoomify.gui.keybindScrolling.description: Use Minecraft keybinds to control scroll zoom instead of the scroll wheel.
zoomify.gui.relativeSensitivity.name: Relative Sensitivity
zoomify.gui.relativeSensitivity.descript: Controls the sensitivity based on the zoom level.
zoomify.gui.relativeViewBobbing.name: Relative View Bobbing
zoomify.gui.relativeViewBobbing.descript: Make view-bobbing less jarring when zoomed in.
zoomify.gui.cinematicCam.name: Cinematic Camera
zoomify.gui.cinematicCam.description: How much the camera glides once moved.
zoomify.gui.spyglassBehaviour.name: Zoom Behaviour
zoomify.gui.spyglassBehaviour.descriptio: How Zoomify interacts with spyglass zoom.
zoomify.gui.spyglassOverlayVisibility.de: When to show the spyglass overlay.
zoomify.gui.spyglassSoundBehaviour.name: Sound Behaviour
zoomify.gui.spyglassSoundBehaviour.descr: When to play the zoom in and out sounds from the spyglass.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoom.label: Completely separate from all other settings of Zoomify. Secondary zoom is toggle-only with a separate keybinding in controls.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomAmount.name: Zoom Amount
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomAmount.descript: How many times to divide the current FOV once transition completes.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomInTime.name: Zoom In Time
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomInTime.descript: How many seconds to complete zooming in.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomOutTime.name: Zoom Out Time
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomOutTime.descrip: How many seconds to complete zooming out.
zoomify.gui.secondaryZoomHideHUDOnZoom.d: Stops rendering the HUD whilst zooming in, much like pressing F1.
zoomify.gui.unbindConflicting.name: Unbind Conflicting Keybind
zoomify.gui.unbindConflicting.descriptio: Removes the keybind that has the same key as Zoomify zoom key.
zoomify.gui.preset.apply.warning: Pressing the button will immediately apply changes!
zoomify.toast.conflictingKeybind.title: Zoomify won't work!
zoomify.toast.conflictingKeybind.descrip: There is a conflicting keybind preventing the usage of the zoom key. You can unbind it in the %s category of Zoomify settings.
zoomify.toast.unbindConflicting.name: Unbound %s
zoomify.toast.unbindConflicting.descript: Zoomify unbound key because it was conflicting with the zoom key.
